Translations.Text: Panjue ri que shi wei tamen quanti guiding de shijian.
Zai na ri, qinyou dui qinyou hao wu yichu, tamen ye de bu dao renhe yuanzhu,
wei an la ci min zhe liwai [zhu]. Ta [an la] que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
[Huo yu li] zan gumu shu de guozi,
que shi zuiren de shiwu,
xiang tong shui yiyang zai [tamen de] fu zhong feiteng,
xiang feishui yiyang feiteng.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Nimen zhua zhu ta, ba ta tuo ru huo yu de zhongyang,
ranhou, nimen ba feishui de xingfa jiao zai ta de tou shang.
Ni changshi [zhe zhong xingfa] ba! Ni [zai chenshi shi] shi duome wangzizunda, duome fugui!
Zhe jiushi nimen [zai chenshi shi] suo huaiyi de [xingfa].”
Jingwei zhe bi zhu zai anquan di difang [leyuan]:
Leyuan he quanshui pang,
tamen chuan de shi jinxiu sichou, yingmian er zuo.
Qi jieguo shi: Wo shi baijing mei mu xianshu di meinu zuo tamen de qizi.
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang anquan de suoqu ge zhong shuiguo.
Chu [chenshi] di yi ci de siwang wai, tamen zai leyuan li jiang bu zai changshi siwang. Ta [an la] jiang baohu tamen mian shou huo yu de xingfa [zhu].
Zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui, zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
Wo dique yi ni de yuyan shi zhe bu “gulanjing” chengwei yi dong de, yibian tamen jieshou quangao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang dengdai, tamen dique ye zai dengdai.
